DOC.brief_summary: Testing efficacy SNRI medication Duloxetine treat OCD patient respond SSRI
DOC.criteria: OCD main diagnosis accord DSMIV Age 18 65 Men woman YBOCS score 18 , 12 case obsession Patients treated Duloxetine , currently past Patients comorbid schizophrenia psychotic disorder bipolar disorder Patients substance abuse disorder last 6 month Patients suicidal serious suicide attempt last year Pregnant lactating woman , woman childbearing potential , use adequate contraception Patients neurologic disturbance disorder Patients serious imbalanced medical condition Patients allergic response SSRI duloxetine Patients start new treatment ( CBT pharmacology ) less 3 month
